Mr. G. F. Roll, Smith Kline and French (continued)
I have merely indicated the above for possible
consideration on your part, as a basis for preliminary *T;

Insofar as the stations are concerned, an indication
of interest by you would be particularly effective if
it were made prior to October 22nd, when the Annual
Meeting of the National Association of Educational
Broadcasters takes place at Lexington, Kentucky.
If there is any manner in which you think I can be
of assistance to you, please do not hesitate to call
on me.
With best wishes, I am
Sincerely yours.
*
Seymour N. Siegel
Director
